name: One Man Army (YeOldeGent)
description:
In the grim dark future there is only war. As a part of the Catachan Jungle Fighters, Sly Marbo is making a name for himself. His newest mission: take out the oncoming ork tank column. Good luck, and may the Emperor's light shine on you. 

Controls: 

Movement - WASD

Interaction - Left Click

Throw Melta Bombs - Left Click (Must be right next to the tanks. Walk around the tank to find their weakness)
